thread.section_title: 4seating.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 4seating.com | 4seating.com | 3 of 24
thread.title: Scott

author: Scott
title: Scott
text: My seats are scheduled to arrive in late January but I wanted to compliment 4seating on the great customer service. I ordered my seats in November and worked with Anna throughout the process. She was thorough in explaining the various options to me and double checked my order to ensure it was correct. I have had periodic questions after ordering and she has always been prompt and responded to my emails on the same day. After a recent question in regards to scheduling, I had the opportunity to work with John Jasso as well who responded so quickly it felt like it was an online chat. He clarified all of the scheduling and delivery details for me and ask if I had any other questions. Great customer service by both Anna and John!
